adHeader: House-Sitter, Errands, Pet Care and More
adDetails: Need some help with your general errands? Going out of town and need someone to check on your house and water plants or a garden? Do you need a house-sitter to stay at your house? Need your pets watched checked in on or stayed with? Flexible Girl Friday in 40's Who is very responsible with references. I have a driver's license, car insurance and own a SUV for larger dog, kids, supplies transportation etc. I've been around animals all of my life so I can be trusted trust me with your babies! My rates will depend on what you need and for how long. I am looking to stay within 15 miles of Santa Clara. Please email me with any questions. Thanks for reading!
